text: The University of Wyoming is a public university in Laramie, Wyoming. The university has about 13,657 students. It was founded in 1886. The current president of the university is Edward Seidel. Dick Cheney went to the University of Wyoming. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Cowboys for the men and the Cowgirls for the women. They are commonly known as the Pokes. They have 17 varsity teams and they compete in the Mountain West Conference. Josh Allen once played quarterback for the Wyoming football team. ==Other websites== *University of Wyoming's Official website *Wyoming Cowboys' Official athletics website Category:Mountain West Conference Category:Colleges and universities in the United States Category:Wyoming Category:1886 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in Wyoming Territory
title: University of Wyoming
